R'lyeh: Slip on wet stones and slide into a pit. Pass a Luck (+0) check to climb out. If you fail, lose 1 Sanity and stay here next turn.
Plateau of Leng: A vast stirring rumbles through the plateau. Pass a Sneak (+0) check or roll a die and lose that much Stamina.
Other: There is nothing here but barren wastes. No encounter.

R'lyeh: The shadow tries to force its way between your lips. Pass a Fight (-2) check or lose 2 Stamina and stay here next turn.
The Dreamlands: While wandering the phosphorescent woods, you are surrounded by hungry zoogs! Make a Luck (-2) check. If you pass, they take a liking to you and give you a gourd of moon-tree wine. Gain 1 Sanity and 1 Clue token. If you fail, the zoogs close in around you, their teeth gleaming. You are LOST IN TIME AND SPACE.
Other: Pass a Luck (-1) check to find a quiet spot to rest. Gain 2 Stamina and 2 Sanity.

Abyss: You are disturbed by unsettling echoes. Pass a Sneak (-1) check to quiet them or lose 2 Sanity.
Plateau of Leng: The loathsome villagers send out their strongest warrior to fight you in unarmed combat. Pass a Fight (-1) [2] check to defeat him and draw 1 Unique Item and gain 1 Clue token. Otherwise lose 1 Sanity and 2 Stamina.
Other: You push yourself to the limit. Roll 1 die for each point of Stamina you have. Lose 1 Stamina for each die that does not roll a success. If you do not fall unconscious, gain 1 Clue token for each die that rolled a success.

Plateau of Leng: The villagers leap around a bonfire on the hoary plain. Pass a Sneak (-1) check or you are captured and subjected to terrible rites. Lose 3 Sanity and 3 Stamina, then stay here next turn.
The Dreamlands: In the valley of Pnoth, where the dholes crawl and burrow nastily, you hear a slithering among the mountains of bone. Make a Sneak (-1) check. If you fail, you are DEVOURED. If you pass, gain 3 Clue tokens and return immediately to Arkham.
Other: Pass a Speed (-1) check to grab the carving before it falls. Draw 1 Spell.

R'lyeh: Hurricane winds smash you against the cyclopean stones. Pass a Fight (-1) check or lose 3 Stamina.
The Dreamlands: The wind increases, and you feel your feet go numb. Pass a Fight (-1) check or lose 2 Stamina.

R'lyeh: You become tangled in the damp seaweed. Pass a Luck (-1) check to pull free before something finds you while you're helpless. If you fail, roll a die and lose that much Stamina.
Plateau of Leng: You are taken to a prehistoric monastery, where a high priest in a yellow silken mask questions you. Pass a Lore (-2) check to answer him to his satisfaction. Gain your freedom and 1 Spell. Otherwise, you are LOST IN SPACE AND TIME.
Other: Pass a Luck (-1) check to discover a useful object in your wanderings. Draw 1 Unique Item.

Abyss: Starving, you consider eating some of the glowing mushrooms. If you decide to do so, make a Luck (-1) check. If you fail, roll a die and lose that much Stamina. If you succeed, roll a die and gain that much Stamina.
Plateau of Leng: A monster appears from the shadows!
Other: The pinkish rays nearly get you. Pass a Sneak (+0) check or lose 2 Stamina.

Abyss: Pass a Speed (-1) check to avoid a monstrous mass. If you fail, you are LOST IN TIME AND SPACE.
Other: The colors are blinding. Pass a Lore (-1) check or stay here next turn.

Abyss: The stone arch breaks! Pass a Speed (-1) check to dive out of the way or roll a die and lose that much Stamina.
The Dreamlands: The ice bridge begins to crack. Pass a Luck (-1) check or fall into the icy depths. If you fall, you are LOST IN TIME AND SPACE.
Other: The humidity and heat is exhausting. Lose 1 Stamina.

The Dreamlands: The shantak claws at you as it swoops past overhead. Pass a Speed (-2) check or lose 2 Stamina as its claws rake your chest.
Other: You sleep, fitfully, and awaken to the sound of your own voice chanting something. Make a Luck (-2) check. If you pass, you are able to retain what you are saying. Draw 1 Spell and gain 2 Clue tokens. If you fail, the chant attracts something unsavory. A monster appears!

Plateau of Leng: While you are climbing a high cliff, you begin to slip. Pass a Speed (-1) check or crash down the mountain, losing 2 Stamina.
The Dreamlands: Avalanche! Pass a Speed (-1) check or lose 3 Stamina.
Other: The shadowy entity gives up the chase. Lose 1 Stamina from exhaustion.

R'lyeh: Pass a Speed (-1) check or you slip and slide down a barnacled surface, slashing your skin to ribbons. Lose 3 Stamina.
Abyss: Pass a Luck (-1) check or you are faced with an enormous mountain with a strange symbol carved into it, as if by the claw of a gigantic creature. The world swims around you and you lose 3 Sanity.
Other: The obsidian door refuses to open. Pass a Fight (-1) check or stay here next turn, struggling with it.
